#summary How to run the prototype.


 # Install Python 2.4 [http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.4.4/python-2.4.4.msi]
 # Install Pysonic for Python 2.4 [http://downloads.sourceforge.net/pysonic/pySonic-0.8.win32-py2.4.exe?modtime=1108217760&big_mirror=0]
 # Download FMOD API [http://www.fmod.org/files/fmodapi375win.zip]
 # Extract fmod.dll from the FMOD API and place in Windows/System32
 # Navigate to tunk/aui_poc in SVN and double click RecordingDemo.py
 # Have fun!
